page.title: 19LOCAL PEOPLES CONCERNS
page.content: The main social concerns for the people of Johnson Fold are those relevant to employment,local services and amenities.There is a high rate of unemployment on the estate but the level of youth employment and the prospects of future employment cause most anxiety.Also the fact that many people on the estate have low income occupations is highlighted by the high level of people receiving some kind of welfare benefit.Many people also would prefer much better recreation facilities such as a sports centre or a community centre.(At the present moment there is a project to build an Astroturf surface on the site of Johnson Fold school).Many people feel that the shopping facilities are poor and that there's a need for a supermarket and a chemist.
